title: Coven

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Coven someone, making them believe they’ve been turned into a random coven role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Making someone believe they’re a coven role doesn’t affect their abilities or attributes
-The effect lasts permanently
-With the necronomicon, you actually turn them into a random coven role instead of just making them believe they were converted

desc:
Post 3632
_You’re a user of magic, you are a member of the Coven!_
